table.name: s_ship_unit
table.description: This table stores the shipment ship unit information. This table was added to identify the actual shipment ship unit as opposed to order release ship unit (in earlier versions of GC3).

columns.name: S_SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the ship unit associated to a shipment.

columns.name: S_SHIP_UNIT_XID
columns.description: The XID for the ship unit associated to a shipment.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit identifier defined for the ship unit. Examples are a box and a pallet.

columns.name: UNIT_LENGTH
columns.description: The length of each shipment ship unit. If this row represents 20 of the same ship units, the total length is 20 x unit length.

columns.name: UNIT_LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the unit length column.

columns.name: UNIT_LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The unit length in base units.

columns.name: UNIT_WIDTH
columns.description: The width of each shipment ship unit. Each row may represent the ship unit count number of same ship units. If this field is null or is 0, the weight of this shipment ship unit is computed as the total of container weight from its ship unit specification and the weight of its shipment ship unit lines.

columns.name: UNIT_WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: Unit of measure for the unit width.

columns.name: UNIT_WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The unit width in base units.

columns.name: UNIT_HEIGHT
columns.description: The height of each shipment ship unit. If this row represents the 20 same ship units, the total height is 20 x unit height.

columns.name: UNIT_HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for unit height column.

columns.name: UNIT_HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The unit height in base units.

columns.name: UNIT_WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight of the ship unit.

columns.name: UNIT_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the unit weight.

columns.name: UNIT_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The unit weight in base units.

columns.name: UNIT_VOLUME
columns.description: The volume of each shipment ship unit. Each row may represent the ship unit count number of same ship units. If this field is null or is 0, the volume of this shipment ship unit is computed as the total of container volume from its ship unit specification and the volume of its shipment ship unit lines.

columns.name: UNIT_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit of measure for the unit volume.

columns.name: UNIT_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The unit volume in base units.

columns.name: FLEX_COMMODITY_CODE
columns.description: The user-defined commodity code for the item. For example HTS, SITC, STCC, NMFC, etc.

columns.name: FLEX_COMMODITY_QUAL_GID
columns.description: A GID to define the type of the commodity code. For example HTS, SITC, STCC, NMFC etc.

columns.name: IS_SPLITABLE
columns.description: A true or false value to define whether the ship unit can be split when creating the shipments.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: Ship units that have the same dimension/weight and contents are represented as one row in the SHIP_UNIT table. SHIP_UNIT_COUNT is the number of these ship units.

columns.name: EARLY_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The early pickup date defined for the ship unit

columns.name: RECEIVED_WEIGHT
columns.description: The received gross weight of the shipment ship unit. It can be entered as a stop debrief. Used for reporting purposes.

columns.name: RECEIVED_WEIGHT_UOM
columns.description: The received gross weight unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The received gross weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_VOLUME
columns.description: The received volume of the shipment ship unit. It can be entered as a stop debrief. Used for reporting purposes.

columns.name: RECEIVED_VOLUME_UOM
columns.description: The received volume unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The received volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The received item package count. It can be entered as a stop debrief.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order release ship unit that is associated to this shipment ship unit.

columns.name: UNIT_NET_WEIGHT
columns.description: The unit net weight of the goods contained in the shipment ship unit.

columns.name: UNIT_NET_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit net weight unit of measure.

columns.name: UNIT_NET_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The unit net weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: UNIT_NET_VOLUME
columns.description: The unit net volume of the goods contained in the shipment ship unit.

columns.name: UNIT_NET_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unit net volume unit of measure.

columns.name: UNIT_NET_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The unit net volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_NET_WEIGHT
columns.description: The received net weight of the shipment ship unit. It can be entered as a stop debrief. Used for reporting purposes.

columns.name: RECEIVED_NET_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The received net weight unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_NET_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The received net weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_NET_VOLUME
columns.description: The received net volume of the shipment ship unit. It can be entered as a stop debrief. Used for reporting purposes.

columns.name: RECEIVED_NET_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The received net volume unit of measure.

columns.name: RECEIVED_NET_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The Received net volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: CORE_DIAMETER
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, this defines the diameter of the core.

columns.name: CORE_DIAMETER_UOM_CODE
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, unit of measure for the diameter of the core.

columns.name: CORE_DIAMETER_BASE
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the base value of the diameter of the core.

columns.name: UNIT_DIAMETER
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, this defines the diameter of the ship unit.

columns.name: UNIT_DIAMETER_UOM_CODE
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the diameter of the ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: UNIT_DIAMETER_BASE
columns.description: For cylindrical objects, the base value of the diameter of the core. For cylindrical objects, the base value of the diameter.

columns.name: TAG_1
columns.description: A flexible field to contain informational data that has been copied from the order to the shipment.

columns.name: TAG_2
columns.description: A flexible field to contain informational data that has been copied from the order to the shipment.

columns.name: TAG_3
columns.description: A flexible field to contain informational data that has been copied from the order to the shipment.

columns.name: TAG_4
columns.description: A flexible field to contain informational data that has been copied from the order to the shipment.

columns.name: T_SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: A GID for the order release ship unit.

columns.name: IS_COUNT_SPLITTABLE
columns.description: Indicates whether the ship unit can be split on the count boundaries when planning during container optimization.

columns.name: TOTAL_GROSS_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total gross weight of the shipment ship unit (transport handling unit + lines).

columns.name: TOTAL_GROSS_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total gross weight unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_GROSS_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total gross weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_GROSS_VOLUME
columns.description: The total gross volume of the shipment ship unit (transport handling unit + lines).

columns.name: TOTAL_GROSS_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total gross volume unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_GROSS_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total gross volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: A Boolean field. When it is set to 'Y', this row and its child data will be purged.

columns.name: RANGE_START
columns.description: The range start value associated with the ship unit to handle the case where the ship unit count is >1 signifying that there are multiple instances of this record.

columns.name: RANGE_END
columns.description: The range end value associated with the ship unit to handle the case where the ship unit count is >1 signifying that there are multiple instances of this record.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: RELEASE_METHOD_GID
columns.description: The release method (order configuration identifier) associated with defining this ship unit. It specifies such attributes as if the ship unit weight is calculated from the ship unit line weight.

columns.name: IS_ALLOW_REPACK
columns.description: If this flag is set to false, when planning order movement that contains this ship unit or combine shipments that contains this shipment ship unit, the shipment ship unit building process will not repack this ship unit.

columns.name: TOTAL_LOADING_SPLIT_WEIGHT
columns.description: Defines the total loading split weight if the ship unit can be split to load into the equipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_LS_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total loading split weight unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_LS_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total loading split weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_LOADING_SPLIT_VOLUME
columns.description: Defines the total loading split volume if the ship unit can be split to load into the equipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_LS_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total loading split volume unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_LS_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total loading split volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PRIORITY
columns.description: Defines the priority associated with ship unit.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_ERU_COUNT
columns.description: Indicates whether the ERU defined on shipment ship unit is used or the ERU is derived from the order. A null value means N.
